globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

entityProperties.name: Crate1
entityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
Breaking into the Imperial Security Bureau isn't easy, To avoid immediate suspicion, your pilot drops you an hour's walk away from the compound.

Fake uniforms and security badges get you surprisingly far. Outside the door to the research lab, however, you're stopped by a probe droid. "Welcome back, General Weiss," it chirps before floating on.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} The door is locked.

eventActions.theText: The droid floats back to its recharge station and deactivates.

entityProperties.name: Prototype
entityProperties.theText:
The prototype of the surveillance droid is dormant.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the prototype to retrieve it.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The Imperial mission token represents the prototype. A Rebel figure can retrieve the prototype.
{-} The mission will progress when a Rebel figure retrieves the prototype.

"Sorry about that," an officer apologizes. "The prototype still has some problems with identification. Wait a minute..." With the extra attention, the officer recognizes you as wanted Rebels. Eyeing the droid, you prepare for a fight as alarms start blaring through the compound.

{-} At the end of each round, {D} is increased.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

{-} The door is locked.
{-} The Imperial mission token represents the prototype. A Rebel figure can retrieve the prototype.
{-} At the end of each round, {D} is increased.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The mission will progress when a Rebel figure retrieves the prototype.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
It's a long fall, but you came prepared. Rappelling down a maintenance shaft, you escape with the prototype in a sack. It continues spouting random names and information all the way back to the ship. Surely this droid knows something useful, even if it's unintelligible.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Failing to capture the prototype, you drop down a secondary shaft. The fall is rough, but you survive. The droid floats over the pit. "Goodbye, new friends!" Blaise now has direct recordings of your team in action. You'll be lucky to evade the ISB in the future.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The Empire receives <color="red">Agent Blaise</color> (ISB Interrogator) as a villain.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Flip Terminal Red
globalEvents.eventText: You deactivate one of the locks.

entityProperties.name: Terminal Red
entityProperties.theText:
The lock mechanism is connected to the other terminal. Both control the access to the maintenance shaft. The lock is deactivated.

{-} When both terminals are on their colored side, the door to the Maintenance Shaft opens.
{-} At the end of each round, the lock reactivates, flipping each colored terminal to its gray side.

globalEvents.name: Flip Terminal Blue
globalEvents.eventText: You deactivate one of the locks.

{-} When both terminals are on their colored side, the door to the Maintenance Shaft opens.

entityProperties.name: Terminal Red
entityProperties.theText:
The lock mechanism is connected to the other terminal. Both control the access to the maintenance shaft.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal (2 {I} or {J}) to deactivate the lock. Decrease the successes needed by 1 if the other terminal is on its colored side. If successful, flip this terminal to its colored side.
{-} When both terminals are on their colored side, the door to the Maintenance Shaft opens.
{-} At the end of each round, the lock reactivates, flipping each colored terminal to its gray side.

globalEvents.name: Maintenance Shaft Opens
globalEvents.eventText: The door to the maintenance shaft slides open. Immediately, wind rushes through the corridors.

entityProperties.name: Terminal Red
entityProperties.theText:
The lock mechanism is connected to the other terminal. Both control the access to the maintenance shaft.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal (2 {I} or {J}) to deactivate the lock. Decrease the successes needed by 1 if the other terminal is on its colored side. If successful, flip this terminal to its colored side.

{-} At the end of each round, the lock reactivates, flipping each colored terminal to its gray side.

entityProperties.name: Maintenance Door
entityProperties.theText:
An old, rusty doors leads into the maintenance shaft.

{-} The door is locked. When both terminals are on their colored side, the door to the Maintenance Shaft opens.

eventActions.theText: Block access to the maintenance shaft.

{-} When each hero is on a blue highlighted space and a figure is carrying the prototype, select the blue highlight and click "Heroes Depart".
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes depart.

{-} When each hero is on a blue highlighted space and a figure is carrying the prototype, select the blue highlight and click "Heroes Depart".
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} At the end of each round, {D} is increased.
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes depart.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Hallway Door Opens
globalEvents.eventText: The door opens into dingy corridors filled with pipes and cables. Not far ahead, you can see another door leading into the huge, central maintenance shaft. This is your way out.

entityProperties.name: Hallway Door
entityProperties.theText:
A security door leads into the maintenance section of Cloud City.

{-} The door is locked.

eventActions.theText: Apparently, your escape route wasn't as hidden as you expected. A tall ISB agent is waiting for you in the corridor. "If you surrender, we will show you mercy," he says. When you don't react immediately, he draws his blaster.
The door to the maintenance shaft is locked by twin locks, each controlled by a computer console.

entityProperties.name: Terminal Red
entityProperties.theText:
The lock mechanism is connected to the other terminal. Both control the access to the maintenance shaft.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal (2 {I} or {J}) to deactivate the lock. Decrease the successes needed by 1 if the other terminal is on its colored side. If successful, flip this terminal to its colored side.
{-} When both terminals are on their colored side, the door to the Maintenance Shaft opens.
{-} At the end of each round, the lock reactivates, flipping each colored terminal to its gray side.

eventActions.theText:
You need to get that door open.

{-} The door is locked.
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a terminal (2 {I} or {J}). Decrease the successes needed by 1 for each terminal on its colored side. If successful, flip that terminal to its colored side.
{-} When both terminals are on their colored side, the door to the Maintenance Shaft opens.
{-} At the end of each round, the lock reactivates, flipping each colored terminal to its gray side.
{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
Open the door to the Maintenance Shaft.

{-} The door is locked.
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a terminal (2 {I} or {J}). Decrease the successes needed by 1 for each terminal on its colored side. If successful, flip that terminal to its colored side.
{-} When both terminals are on their colored side, the door to the Maintenance Shaft opens.
{-} At the end of each round, the lock reactivates, flipping each colored terminal to its gray side.
{-} At the end of each round, {D} is increased.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Retrieve Prototype
globalEvents.eventText:
"Good morning, Interrogator. Oh! Let me get the door for you, sir."

{-} The door is now unlocked to Rebel figures.
{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
